data.name: IncorrectReport2
data.value:
Your plot has been checked by Greenpeace and we have determinated than your report was wrong.

What this means?
The plot that you reported in Green (safe) was reviewed by our experts who determined thatit do have deforestation.

But don't worry, in time you'll gain more experience and train your eye to better identify deforested areas and safe.

What happens now?
From this moment, the plot will be able to Denounce. It will be Red in Guardians, and if you click on it instead of [Report] it would say [Denounce].

When you see the form, make your denounce and Click [Submit] to relevant authorities to receive your claim.

Tips to enhance your reports
  • You can play the minigame I from the [Help] menu to learn to differentiate safe areas from deforested.
  • You can return to see the Pre-Tutorial from the [Help] menu.
  • You can review other verified plots (in red) to compare correct reports.
Do not drop your arms, continues to report plots forest plots to keep forest safe!

data.name: IncorrectReport3
data.value:
Your plot has been checked by Greenpeace and we have determinated than your report was wrong.

What this means?
The plot that you reported in Yellow (deforestation) was reviewed by our experts who determined thatit do not have deforestation.

, or that deforestation was earlier than {0}, when we do not have forest law.

But there is a disassemble, why did i had a plot assigned with previous deforestation to {1}?

In some cases, Guardians assign plots near the limits between protected zones and deforested or green. When this happends, plots may look like they are in a protected area, when in fact most of it is in an area already removed

We are working to correct this problem. If this is your case, we ask apologies for the inconvenience!
What happens now?
From this moment, the plot will be green. When available a new satellite image, this parcel will be available to the guardians, so you can check for clearings have been.

Tips to enhance your reports
  • You can play the minigame I from the [Help] menu to learn to differentiate safe areas from deforested.
  • You can return to see the Pre-Tutorial from the [Help] menu.
  • You can review other verified plots (in red) to compare correct reports.
Do not drop your arms, continues to report plots forest plots to keep forest safe!

data.name: LandVerifications
data.value: You came to 30 checks on your plot

data.name: LandVerifications2
data.value: Congratulations, another 30 guardians have verified the report of your plot.

data.name: LandVerifications3
data.value: From now Greenpeace will verify the validity of the report!

data.name: LandVerifications4
data.value: Click here to continue protecting the forest

data.name: LandVerifications7
data.value: . If you do not want to receive notifications in the future you can access the User Control Panel and disable the notifications.

data.name: LandVerified2
data.value:
Your plot has been checked by Greenpeace and we have determinated than your report was correct.

What this means?
The plot that you reported in Yellow (deforestation) has been effectively deforested. This fact should be reported, we can not allow the deforestation in areas protected by the Forest Law.

From this moment, your parcel will be enabled for Denounces. It will appear with a red color within Guardians, and clicking on it and then clicking [Report], you will have enabled the [Report] button.

When you see the form, make your complaint and Click [Submit] to relevant authorities to receive your claim.

Continues to report plots forest plots to keep forest safe!

data.name: MailBienvenidaBotonTooltip
data.value: Click here to start protecting the forest

data.name: MailBienvenidaCuerpo
data.value:
To start playing click the button!

Tips to play
  • You can have a new plot clicking [Change Plot]
  • Comment on other users plots to helph them reporting
  • Complete all tutorials and play miniGames
  • Login many times in the same day to get more points

data.name: MailBienvenidaTitulo
data.value: You are now protecting the forest!

data.name: NoMoreLands
data.value: This region has been completed thanks to your participation and the other guardians. Soon we will have a new satellite image to continue monitoring. Meanwhile, you can check other region.

data.name: ReportVerifiedCorrect
data.value:
Your plot has been checked by Greenpeace and we have determinated than your report was correct.

What this means?
The plot that you reported in Green (safe) effectively has not been deforested. When available a new satellite image, this plot will be available for guardians   so that you can check again for deforestation

Continues to report plots forest plots to keep forest safe!
